subwindow.name: main_frame
subwindow.script: function onInit() self.npcNode = CrewSupportManager.getNewNPCNode(self.handleNPCNode) self.saving = false end function handleNPCNode(oobMsg) if oobMsg.user == User.getUsername() then self.npcNode = oobMsg.nodeName end end function onClose() if not (self.saving) then DB.deleteNode(self.npcNode) end end function closeAll() window.header_frame.setValue("", "") self.setValue("", "") end function addNPC(sourceNode, copy) window.resetAttributeSelect() if sourceNode and copy then DB.copyNode(sourceNode, self.npcNode) window.header_frame.setValue("supporting_character_header", self.npcNode) self.setValue("st_npc_main", self.npcNode) window.rollCombinedDetails() elseif sourceNode then window.header_frame.setValue("supporting_character_header", sourceNode) self.setValue("st_npc_main", sourceNode) else DB.deleteChildren(self.npcNode) window.header_frame.setValue("supporting_character_header", self.npcNode) self.setValue("st_npc_main", self.npcNode) window.rollCombinedDetails() end self.subwindow.setReadOnly(true) end

windowlist.name: crew_manifest
windowlist.script:
function onInit() self.mode = "available" self.setDatabaseNode("charsheet") window.reTargetManifest() self.applyFilter() end
function setMode(mode) self.mode = mode window.reTargetManifest() self.applyFilter() end
function onFilter(crewEntry) return CrewSupportManager.crewState(crewEntry.getDatabaseNode()) == self.mode end
function clearButtons() window.clearManifestSelections() end

buttoncontrol.name: roll_support_species
buttoncontrol.script: function onButtonPress() local w = Interface.openWindow("storytemplate", "") local rawVal = ""; local defaultMode = LifePathTableManager.getDefaultTable() if defaultMode == "MANUAL" then if STAModuleManager.modLoaded(STAModuleManager.MODULE_EXTRA) then rawVal = w.generate.performTableLookups("[Memory Alpha Weighted Species]") else w.close() return end else local tableName, _ = LifePathTableManager.getActiveStepName(defaultMode, 1) rawVal = w.generate.performTableLookups("[".. tableName .."]") end w.close() f = string.gmatch(rawVal, "[|]([^|]+)") class, link, name = f(), f(), f() window.species_link.setValue(class, link) window.species.setValue(name) end

stringfield.name: name
stringfield.script: function onInit() self.setButtonText() end function setButtonText() window.select_button.setStateText(0, formatText(), formatText()) window.select_button.setStateText(1, formatText(), formatText()) end function formatText() if User.isHost() then local owner = DB.getOwner(window.getDatabaseNode()) if owner and not(owner == "") then return getValue() .. " ("..owner..")" end else local owner = DB.isOwner(window.getDatabaseNode()) if owner then return getValue() .. " (owned)" end end return getValue() end function onValueChanged() self.setButtonText() end

buttoncontrol.name: select_button
buttoncontrol.script:
function setTarget(target) self.target = target self.copy = CrewSupportManager.crewState(window.getDatabaseNode()) == "template" end
function onButtonPress() window.windowlist.clearButtons() self.setValue(1) self.target.addNPC(window.getDatabaseNode().getNodeName(), self.copy) end
